languages.text: "Этот предмет — одно из наиболее сложных и совершенных творений расы куда более древней, чем друкари. Фактически это — не просто вещь, а целая сокровищница технологий. Мудрый мастер может открыть множество тайн, наблюдая за ним".

"It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."
languages.original_text: "Этот предмет — одно из наиболее сложных и совершенных творений расы куда более древней, чем друкари. Фактически это — не просто вещь, а целая сокровищница технологий. Мудрый мастер может открыть множество тайн, наблюдая за ним".

traits.locale_text: "This item is one of the most complicated and perfect creation of a race much more ancient than the Drukhari. Basically, this is not just a thing — this is a treasury of technology. A wise master can uncover many secrets just by watching it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "This item is one of the most complicated and perfect creation of a race much more ancient than the Drukhari. Basically, this is not just a thing — this is a treasury of technology. A wise master can uncover many secrets just by watching it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "This item is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much more ancient than the Drukhari. Basically, this isn't just a thing—this is a treasure trove of technology. A wise master can uncover many secrets by simply watching it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Il s'agit de l'une des créations les plus complexes et les plus perfectionnées d'une race bien plus ancienne que les Drukharis. Ce n'est pas un simple objet, mais un trésor de technologie. Un maître avisé pourrait découvrir bien des secrets rien qu'en l'observant. »
languages.original_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit de l'une des créations les plus complexes et les plus perfectionnées d'une race bien plus ancienne que les Drukharis. Ce n'est pas un simple objet, mais un trésor de technologie. Un maître avisé pourrait découvrir bien des secrets rien qu'en l'observant. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Es una de las creaciones más complejas y perfectas de una raza mucho más antigua que los Drukhari. No se trata de un objeto, sino de una cornucopia de tecnología. Un maestro sabio puede descubrir muchos secretos con tan solo observarlo».
languages.original_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."

traits.locale_text: «Este objeto es una de las creaciones más complejas y perfectas de una raza mucho más antigua que los Drukhari. En pocas palabras, no se trata de un objeto, sino de una cornucopia de tecnología. Un maestro sabio puede descubrir muchos secretos con tan solo observarlo».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “它是这世上最复杂、最完美的造物之一，源自某个比黑暗灵族更加古老的种族。那块碎片并不仅仅是个物件，更是一座技术宝库。在聪明人手中，哪怕仅仅是观察那块碎片，都会发现很多秘密。”
languages.original_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."

traits.locale_text: “那块碎片是这世上最复杂、最完美的造物之一，源自某个比黑暗灵族更加古老的种族。可以说，那块碎片并不仅仅是个物件，更是一座技术宝库。如果落在聪明人手中，只要单纯地看着那块碎片，就会发现很多秘密。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Dieser Gegenstand ist eine der kompliziertesten und perfektesten Schöpfungen einer Spezies, die noch viel älter ist als die Drukhari. Er ist kein bloßer Gegenstand, sondern ein Füllhorn technologischer Schätze. Ein weiser Meister könnte viele Geheimnisse ergründen, indem er ihn lediglich studiert."
languages.original_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Gegenstand ist eine der kompliziertesten und perfektesten Schöpfungen einer Spezies, die noch viel älter ist als die Drukhari. Im Grunde ist das nicht einfach nur ein Ding — es ist eine Schatzkammer der Technologie. Ein weiser Meister kann viele Geheimnisse ergründen, indem er ihnen einfach nur zusieht."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「この道具は、デュカーリよりもはるかに古い種族の、最も複雑かつ完璧な創造物のひとつだ。これは単なる物体ではなく、技術の宝庫でもあるのだ。賢明な主人であれば、これを見るだけで多くの秘密を暴くことができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."

traits.locale_text: 「この道具は、デュカーリよりもはるかに古い種族の、最も複雑かつ完璧な創造物のひとつだ。これは単なる物体ではなく、技術の宝庫でもあるのだ。賢明な主人であれば、これを見るだけで多くの秘密を暴くことができるだろう」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Drukharilerden çok daha eski bir ırka ait, karmaşık ve mükemmel yaratımlardan bir tanesi çünkü. Sadece bir nesne değil, aynı zamanda bir teknoloji hazinesi. Bilge bir üstat, onu sadece inceleyerek birçok sırrı açığa çıkarabilir."
languages.original_text: "It is one of the most complicated and perfect creations of a race much older than the Drukhari. It is no mere object, but a treasure trove of technology. A wise master could uncover many secrets simply by observing it."
